# Visualização Computacional

```{python}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

f = lambda x: -x**2 + 6*x - 8
x = np.linspace(0, 6, 400)
y = f(x)

plt.figure(figsize=(6,4))
plt.plot(x, y, label=r"$f(x)=-x^2+6x-8$")
plt.axhline(0, linestyle="--")
plt.scatter([2,4],[0,0], label="raízes")
plt.scatter([3],[1], marker="s", label="vértice")
plt.legend()
plt.grid(True, linestyle=":")
plt.title("A Ponte-Parábola do Reino dos Gráficos")
plt.show()
```
